name: Punch Bob
description:
Each time you kill Bob he comes back faster and stronger! See how long you can last.

Punch Bob with 'W'

Use 'A' and 'D' to move the glove left or right. 

This game is the product of a three-work assignment for my MFA in Game Design at NYU. It's the first game I made in Unity from scratch : D

Title theme by Omnigrad based off Angelo Badalamenti's Twin Peaks theme: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GMDfKiqkdLA
